About Me

Developer & Innovator

I'm a passionate frontend developer with 8 months of hands-on experience building responsive, accessible web applications. My skill set focuses on modern JavaScript ES6+, CSS Grid & Flexbox, and semantic HTML5 practices.

Currently developing Sleek, an ambitious project aimed at transforming how developers share and discover code snippets. This platform represents my journey from learning fundamentals to creating real-world solutions that can impact the developer community.
